pages.title: Pusher Node
pages.text: The pusher node actively tries to keep the connected inventory empty from items.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The order, in which it pushes items to is as follows:$(br)1. $(l:pastel_network/puller_node)Puller Nodes$(/l)$(br)2. $(l:pastel_network/storage_node)Storage Nodes$(/l)
